title: Ep 207: The Psychology of Vine
description: Would you believe there's a lot of psychology you can fit into a 6 second vine?  Well there is.  In this video episode I show you a few of there vines I like and which are also good (unintended) demonstrates of a variety of psychological concepts.  I think you'll have fun with this one.
